## StatusBarBuilderOptions.first property

Color configuration for the first column.

**Signature:**

```typescript
first: {
        foreground: ColorInput;
        background: ColorInput;
    };
```

## Remarks

The first column is left-aligned and truncates if content exceeds 30 characters. Typically used for app name or mode display.
